revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=WRT610N |revision=v2 |upc=745883585205 |asin=B001AZ01EO |serialnum_prefix=CTG1 |fcc_date=07/29/2009 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=CyberTAN |type=wireless router |fcc_id=Q87-WRT610NV2 |ic_id=3839A-WRT610NV2 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4718A1 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Eon |fla1_model=EN29LV640B |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5PS5162FFR |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4718A1 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4322 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM53115 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |tp_firmware=DD-WRT,OpenWrt,TomatoUSB, |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_pass=admin |oui=00:25:9C,68:7F:74 |oui_eth=00:25:9C,68:7F:74 }} {{TagLine|Simultaneous Dual-N Band Wireless Router}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=WRT610N}}
"3763-40300105R" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :WRT610N v2 Serial No (S/N) appear to start with '''CTG1'''. <!--{{TechInfoDepot|Linksys_WRT610N_v2.0}}, [http://infodepot.wikia.com/wiki/Linksys_WRT610N_v2.0 On InfoDepot]-->
===Wikis=== *[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Linksys_routers ''Linksys routers'' page on '''Wikipedia'''] *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/linksys/wrt610n ''WRT610N'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] - OpenWRT works, you will need to build :it with broadcom-wl to achieve full speed and make use of both radios.
===Forum threads=== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=33836 ''WRT610N'' thread on the '''DD-WRT''' forums] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=54216 ''WRT610N - Status'' thread on the '''DD-WRT''' forums] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=137565 ''Change your 610n V2 into an E3000 - Amended'' on the '''DD-WRT''' forums] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=380273 ''Unbrick/Install WRT610N v1&v2 using TFTP'' on the '''DD-WRT''' forums] :(label shot, 00:25:9C OUI)
===Serial=== *[http://vectormm.net/routers/other-routers/59-vosstanovlenie-linksys-wrt-610n-cherez.html ''Linksys WRT-610N Serial Recovery'' on '''VectorMM''']
